general.gigTitle: build, design website, redesign, clone, wordpress website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Wordpress Website Design and Development
sellerCard.description:
I'm Saleem, a certified website designer & developer with over 5 years of experience specializing in WordPress website design and eCommerce services.

I have extensive expertise in WordPress, handling all related issues and customizing websites to meet client needs.

Over the past seven years, I've developed more than 300 websites. My skilled and experienced team supports all kinds of website development projects.

Client satisfaction is my main goal, and I prioritize all my clients' requirements, putting in my best effort to ensure their success.

Send me a message if you have any questions.

description.content:
Welcome to My Services


Are you looking for a top-quality WordPress Website Developer to build, design, redesign, clone, customize or revamp WordPress website.


Great! You've come to the right place.


I can help you build a responsive website from scratch development or redesign an existing WordPress site to the next level and highlight your brand identity.


Highlighted Gig Services:

  1. Professional, Clean, Modern & Stunning WordPress Website
  2. All Devices are Responsive and User Friendly
  3. E-commerce and Payment method integration 
  4. Social Media integration and Live Chat
  5. Speed Optimization & SSL Certificate Installation
  6. Domain and Hosting Setup
  7. WordPress and Plugins Installation
  8. Use Demo Copy right free graphic


You will get Quality services and excellent support in good cost. You can hire me for any Website Development needs.


Why should hire me :


  1. Best Quality & Fast Delivery
  2. 24/7 available & Good communication
  3. 30 Days of Free ongoing Support
  4. Unlimited Revisions
  5. Free Video instruction


This service is amazing and impressive, Right? I can guarantee you the Quality of work.


Still not sure we're a good fit? Contact me to schedule a Zoom call.


Kind Regards

Saleem

slide.name: build, design website, redesign, clone, wordpress website development
build, design website, redesign, clone, wordpress website development
build, design website, redesign, clone, wordpress website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide hosting and domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I will not provide hosting and domain. But i will proper guide you how to setup domain and hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What details do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need your domain & hosting login or simple wordpress login info with website content that includes logo, images, and a brief business concept.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Am I able to make changes after completing the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will create a video tutorial for making changes/update in your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If need any support in the future do you provide?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide you 30 days Free after-sale service and will get lifetime paid service as well.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am new and confused what i actually need?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you are new and dont know what you actually need, I will share the zoom connection here on fiverr and will completely guide you about.

reviews.comment: Excellent service. Saleem delivered quality work and on time. I would highly recommend this developer and would get more work done from him in future.

Saleem delivered a top-notch website that was entirely bug-free, showcasing his exceptional attention to detail and code expertise. Working with him was a pleasure as he went ABOVE AND BEYOND, communicated fluently, and demonstrated a deep understanding of my needs. 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the kind words.

reviews.comment: Good communication and good work , happy with the results and service. Thank you, Highly Recommend!

Saleem was attentive to the details that I asked for and got the project done fairly quickly. I will work with him again on future projects before .. matter of fact this is the 4rth project that he did for me and I recommended him to someone else.
Saleem has been a great support. He has done a fantastic work, and he has been able to perfectly translate my wishes into a website. I recommend it without any doubt.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the kind words.
